# 64-Bit Signed Integer Vectors

**API Collection**

Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 64-bit integer elements.

## Vector Data Types

- **simd_long1**: A vector of one 64-bit signed integer element.
- **simd_long2**: A vector of two 64-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_long3**: A vector of three 64-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_long4**: A vector of four 64-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_long8**: A vector of eight 64-bit signed integer elements.

## Packed Vector Data Types

- **simd_packed_long2**: A packed vector of two 64-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_long4**: A packed vector of four 64-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_long8**: A packed vector of eight 64-bit signed integer elements.

## Signed Integer Vectors

- **8-Bit Signed Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 8-bit integer elements.
- **16-Bit Signed Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 16-bit integer elements.
- **32-Bit Signed Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 32-bit integer elements.
